reviewText: This is a complete disaster of a release. For anyone who enjoyed the PC release of Motorhead, this is not it. This is the PSX version. The screenshot previews of the game do not even do the shoddy graphics justice. It gave me a headache to even try to play this in fullscreen, and windowed mode is not much better. This game is also impossible to play with a keyboard, which is what I used to play the game back when it was originally released, and the controls cannot be modified. So please do your best to enjoy utilizing both WSAD and the NUM PAD not only to drive your vehicle, but to decrypt the main menu navigation, as the mouse does absolutely nothing.\n\nPlease do not waste your money on this game. There were no reviews for it when I purchased it, so I had no forewarning of how bad of a port it would be. You're better off finding the PC port elsewhere. It's a vastly superior experience to this version.
voteText: 60 of 71 people (85%) found this review helpful 5 people found this review funny

reviewText:
Sorry, but this re-release looks terrible. I thought maybe they did something foolish, and chose bad screenshots to show off the game, but no, the game looks worse on my GTX 780 than it did on my Voodoo 2.  Somehow there are actually framerate problems too making it difficult to play.

You can see how the game should look: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q0A2uWu52WI

On the plus side, there is controller support, including for xbox 360 controller. Best thing I can say about the game is that the soundtrack is retained (tied with Wipeout XL for best racing soundtrack).

Not recommended to actually play the game.

reviewText: This is not the pc version, the question might be why did they release this at all if you played the original you would know how much beter it was. All of twenty minutes to figure out that this games cant be tweeked or configured to overcome the graphic issues before I requested a refund. On a lighter not this game is extremely hard to find on cd I `ve  seen it on cd, amazon and ebay this is probably due to the fact that  Fox interactive went out of business Fifteen years ago.

reviewText:
Fun little game , worth the $5 I picked it up for.
Pros:
Great controls (Keep in mind I used an Xbox Controller)
Runs perfectly fine on my crap laptop
DANK MIDI MUSIC

Cons:
Simpler gameplay (just Gas, reverse, handbrake)
Not much content
Music skipped once


Its a fun racer, with very good controls. if you're in need of a racing game, that genre that is strangely sparse on Steam, Its worth a try. Just flat out racing if you're in need of it.

AND DANK MIDIs

reviewText: I loved this game on my PS1 back in the day, So I got it for my PC and it's awesome as it was on the PS1 But WAY BATTER, The gameplay is so much fun the Graphics are great way batter then the PS1 version I recommend it if your in to old school racing games like Ridge Racer, it has a lot of really good cars in it really fun racing tracks it also has 2 player split screen a bunch of different gameplay modes like Quick race, Single Race, League Race, Time Attack, Ghost Mode, Head 2 Head, Time difference. it has Controller Support for Xbox 360 Controller, PS1 & PS3 & PS4 Controller. It has a lot of resolution settings like 320p SD, 480p SD, 720p HD, 1080p HD. Well that's my review hope it helps.
